exchange.question: Why are most of your goods out of stock?
exchange.answer: Without trade, we have no goods.

exchange.question: Why isn't there any trade on this island?
exchange.answer: Because Captain Crawfish stole everything we had!

exchange.question: Is there anything I can do?
exchange.answer: Find a way to bring merchants back to our port!
